Name: Margherita Pizza
Description: A classic pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil.

Name: Spaghetti Carbonara
Description: A pasta dish consisting of spaghetti noodles tossed in a creamy sauce made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

Name: Mozzarella Sticks
Description: Breaded and fried sticks of mozzarella cheese, served with marinara sauce for dipping.

Name: Classic Cheeseburger
Description: A juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, and mayonnaise, served on a toasted bun.

Name: California Roll
Description: A type of sushi roll filled with crab meat, avocado, and cucumber, wrapped in seaweed and sushi rice, served with soy sauce and pickled ginger.

Name: Pepperoni Pizza
Description: A classic pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and slices of pepperoni, baked to perfection.

Name: Fettuccine Alfredo
Description: A creamy pasta dish made with fettuccine noodles tossed in a rich Alfredo sauce made from butter, cream, and Parmesan cheese.

Name: Chicken Wings
Description: Crispy fried chicken wings tossed in a spicy buffalo sauce and served with celery sticks and blue cheese dressing.

Name: BBQ Bacon Burger
Description: A delicious burger featuring a juicy beef patty topped with crispy bacon, tangy barbecue sauce, cheddar cheese, lettuce, and tomato.

Name: Salmon Nigiri
Description: A type of sushi consisting of thinly sliced raw salmon served atop a small mound of vinegared rice, typically garnished with wasabi and soy sauce.
